Title: The Plague
Plot: Rabbit-phobic Bishop Brennan pays a visit to investigate reports of Father Jack sleepwalking naked. Unfortunately Dougal has overrun the house with rabbits, and a Terry & June-style farce ensues as Ted and Dougal attempt to keep Father Jack in bed, and the ever-multiplying rabbits away from the bishop.
GuestStars: Tony Guilfoyle, Jim Norton (I), Pat Shortt, Paul Wonderful, James Rymer, Arthur Mathews, David Heap, Joan Sheehy
